Question: As a young single man in the 1940s, this person had affairs with Danish journalist Inga Arvad, and actress Gene Tierney.
Hints: This person's initial reaction was to ignore this, as long as free access from West to East Berlin continued.
This person stated that anyone who contributed to a campaign fund should not expect any favors in return.
This person enrolled and audited classes at the Stanford Graduate School of Business that fall.
